name: Star Command - FPS Project
description:
Star Command is a project I plan to build on.

My plan is to keep building on Star Command adding new and intresting ideas and letting the game progress on its own.

Please note this game is still in very early stages and this demo is purely WIP, there is no sound and no gameplay mechanics. It is purely for demonstration purposes at the moment.

Please leave comments, I would love to hear your comments.
